name: Spaghetti Clicker
description:
Spaghetti clicker is an idle game with a twist. Even if you still need to click something, there are buildings separating shops and your home. You also need to convert your spaghettis to coins for buying upgrades, stuff, or even pets.

You cannot get addicted to this game after playing it for a while because I didn't intend to make my game addictive when making the game.

"Do you like spaghetti? haha! NEway, this project is awesome. gr8 animation!"
— lyonsnate1

"Could u make me a game about eating footballs?"
— footballYUM

 "THIS GAME IS LIKE A REAL GAME FROM LIKE APP STORE OR GOOGLE PLAY I LIKE THIS SSOOOOOOO SOOOO FUNNN!"
— ThunderPanda990

"Amazing and A+ Graphics so much small details that make it amazing!"
— LE4V_2021Bobcat

The game was made using Scratch 3.0 and all of the comments show here is also from here.
